description.p: A 2-D freeform space mystery game featuring exploration, trading, and combat mechanics similar to games like Endless Sky and Starsector, and a branching mystery storyline written in a manner inspired by works like Star Control 2 (The Ur-Quan Masters) and The Expanse.

You assume control of a space ship and are free to advance thru the game however you want. Uncover the cause of the mysterious Incident, discover the source of the pirate scourge, or make your own way in the galaxy. In the eye of the storm that is chaos, there is great opportunity.
